name: Doof Doof: Destroyer of Worlds
description:
# YES

Doof Doof: Destroyer of worlds is a game where you have to save your planet from a deadly meteor that is headed for your home planet, by launching missiles at the meteor, made from resources gained by destroying other planets in a pixel physics simulation.

- Explore Space

- Visit Planets

- Buy Upgrades

## Controls

WASD - Move

E - Enter planet

Click - Shoot

1,2,3,4 - Buy from shop
